messages.content: Could be depression with psychotic features. Talk to your doctor asap!
I was more concerned that your comment held a frame of reference assuming it was real.
please report the physical and emotional abuse to the police so there is record of it. And get a lawyer ASAP.
Best of luck in Cleveland, Plaw Dog!
It's over! Move on and find a better partner.
Dude, its **life** it's not **trauma**. Grow up
I carry on an empty. But I also carry a single action. So don't make my mistakes.
Rose coloured glasses get rosier as time goes by :) You'll move on eventually. Treasure the memory but be present in your current and future relationships.
good luck! I wish you the best <33
You got the true ending don't worry, you would only get the bad ending if you rat out your friends or accepted the deal
You have to live for you. Go get that education, go get that career. Rediscover yourself.
You’re a life saver, wish you a blessed new year
There’s no evidence that 12-step programs work any better than no program, so you’re not missing anything if you quit. Good luck.
